Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (var i = 0; i < 10; i++)              {                  var p = new PersonViewModel()                      {                          FirstName = "F" + i'                          LastName = "L" + i'                          HomeAddress = new AddressViewModel()                              {                                  City = "C" + i'                                  StreetAddress = "S" + i'                                  ZipCode = "Z" + i                              }'                          WorkAddress = new AddressViewModel()                              {                                  City = "WC" + i'                                  StreetAddress = "WS" + i'                                  ZipCode = "WZ" + i                              }'                      };                  list.Add(p);              }
